name: Companies with domestic R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company in the software products and embedded software technology focus area, by industry and company size: 2015
description: Companies with domestic R&D paid for by the company and others and performed by the company in the software products and embedded software technology focus area, by industry and company size: 2015

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_domestic_r_d_companies_number_a
variableMeasured.description: Domestic R D Companies Number A

variableMeasured.name: field_software_products_and_embedded_software_r_d_total_companies_number_b
variableMeasured.description: Software Products And Embedded Software R D Total Companies Number B

variableMeasured.name: field_software_products_and_embedded_software_r_d_total_amount
variableMeasured.description: Software Products And Embedded Software R D Total Amount

variableMeasured.name: field_software_products_and_embedded_software_r_d_paid_for_by_company_companies_number_b
variableMeasured.description: Software Products And Embedded Software R D Paid For By Company Companies Number B

variableMeasured.name: field_software_products_and_embedded_software_r_d_paid_for_by_company_amount
variableMeasured.description: Software Products And Embedded Software R D Paid For By Company Amount

variableMeasured.name: field_software_products_and_embedded_software_r_d_paid_for_by_others_total_companies_number_b
variableMeasured.description: Software Products And Embedded Software R D Paid For By Others Total Companies Number B

variableMeasured.name: field_software_products_and_embedded_software_r_d_paid_for_by_others_total_amount
variableMeasured.description: Software Products And Embedded Software R D Paid For By Others Total Amount

variableMeasured.name: field_software_products_and_embedded_software_r_d_paid_for_by_others_federally_funded_companies_number_b
variableMeasured.description: Software Products And Embedded Software R D Paid For By Others Federally Funded Companies Number B

variableMeasured.name: field_software_products_and_embedded_software_r_d_paid_for_by_others_federally_funded_amount
variableMeasured.description: Software Products And Embedded Software R D Paid For By Others Federally Funded Amount

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D. Some R&D may be reported in more than one application area. Some R&D is not classified in any application area.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business R&D and Innovation Survey, 2015.
